title: So when are we going to do something about all the bots in Treeline?
body: Its terrible at this point. Every game is mostly just bots. Its an overall unenjoyable experience and you have no motivation to go play it.

replies.body: Are there bots even in ranked?
havent seen any yet, and tbh ranked treeline so far is alot more relaxed than rift.  very few flamers
They use to be in dominion, but then riot decided they should put them in TTL instead.
If only riot hadnt remade treeline...it use to be so fun, had its own communication ty, fanbase and everything, now its just a shiny but hollow shell of its old self, filled with bots.
